  • Method Details

    • updateOrderProducts

      public static ServerMessage updateOrderProducts(Hashtable<String,Object> data, boolean isAdd, Instruction inst)
      This method is used to update the products of an order in the database. The products can either be added or removed from the order, depending on the value of the 'isAdd' parameter.
      Parameters:
      data - A Hashtable that contains data for the method, including the products to be updated and the facility ID.
      isAdd - A boolean value indicating whether the products should be added or removed from the order.
      inst - A Instruction enum value indicating the instruction of the method
      Returns:
      A ServerMessage object containing information about the updated order.

    • updateProduct

      private static void updateProduct(String facilityID, Statement stmt, int amount, int productCode) throws SQLException
      This method updates the quantity of a product in a specific facility.
      Parameters:
      facilityID - The id of the facility where the product is located.
      stmt - The statement object used to execute the update query.
      amount - The amount to update the quantity by. Can be positive or negative.
      productCode - The code of the product to update the quantity for.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the update query.

    • updateStatusProductInFacility

      private static void updateStatusProductInFacility(String facilityID, Statement stmt) throws SQLException
      This method updates the status of products in a specific facility.
      Parameters:
      facilityID - The id of the facility to update the product status for.
      stmt - The statement object used to execute the update query.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the update query.

    • passing_Threshold_Level

      private static void passing_Threshold_Level(String facilityID, int quantity, int code, Statement stmt) throws SQLException
      This method updates the passed threshold level of a product in a specific facility.
      Parameters:
      facilityID - The id of the facility where the product is located.
      quantity - The amount of product to be added or subtracted.
      code - The code of the product to update the threshold level for.
      stmt - The statement object used to execute the update query.
      Throws:
      SQLException

      Parameters:
      data - type Hashtable , with all information on the oreder from client
      Returns:
      A ServerMessage object containing an instruction of type Order_Update and a Hashtable containing the created order, depend on whice oreder created

    • makeOrder

      private static void makeOrder(Statement stmt, String orderProducts, Order order, RegisteredCustomer registeredCustomer) throws SQLException, Exception
      This method creates an order in the database and sets the order number for the order object.
      Parameters:
      stmt - The statement object used to execute the query.
      orderProducts - A String representing the products in the order, in the format suitable for the database.
      order - The Order object to be created in the database.
      registeredCustomer - The RegisteredCustomer object associated with the order.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the query.
      Exception

    • makeShippment

      private static void makeShippment(Shipment order, RegisteredCustomer user) throws SQLException
      This method insert a shipment order in the database
      Parameters:
      order - The Shipment object containing the order information.
      user - The RegisteredCustomer object associated with the order.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the query.

    • makeSelfCollection

      private static void makeSelfCollection(SelfCollection order, RegisteredCustomer user) throws SQLException
      This method is used to create a self-collection order in the database. It takes in two parameters, an object of the SelfCollection class and an object of the RegisteredCustomer class.
      Parameters:
      order - An object of the SelfCollection class that contains the order details.
      user - An object of the RegisteredCustomer class that contains the user details.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an exception occurs when interacting with the database.

    • updateDebt

      private static void updateDebt(RegisteredCustomer user, float amount) throws SQLException
      This method is used to update the debt of a registered customer in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - An object of the RegisteredCustomer class that contains the user details.
      amount - A float value representing the amount to be added to the user's debt.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an exception occurs when interacting with the database.

    • updateFirstOrder

      private static void updateFirstOrder(RegisteredCustomer user) throws SQLException
      This method is used to update the first order status of a registered customer in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - An object of the RegisteredCustomer class that contains the user details.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an exception occurs when interacting with the database.

    • stringfyOrder

      private static String stringfyOrder(ArrayList<Product> productaArrayList)
      This method is used to convert an ArrayList of Product objects into a string representation. Each product will be represented as a string in the format: "productName,quantity"
      Parameters:
      productaArrayList - An ArrayList of Product objects to be converted into a string.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the ArrayList of products.

    • getUserOrders

      public static ServerMessage getUserOrders(Hashtable<String,Object> data)
      Retrieves orders associated with a specific user from the database.
      Parameters:
      data - A hashtable that contains the "username" key, the value is a user's username (String) , and will be used to store the results of the query. The following keys will be added: "localOrSelfOrders" (an ArrayList of Order objects) "shipmentOrders" (an ArrayList of Shipment objects), "selfCollectionOrders" (an ArrayList of SelfCollection objects)
      Returns:
      ServerMessage An object that encapsulates the result of the method.

    • updateOrder

      public static ServerMessage updateOrder(Hashtable<String,Object> data)
      Updates the status of a specific shipment order in the database.
      Parameters:
      data - A hashtable that contains the "orderToUpdate" key, the value is a Shipment object that contains the updated status.
      Returns:
      ServerMessage An object with "Nothing to get" instruction to the client because its update the DB and don't get any result.

    • getShipmentByArea

      public static ServerMessage getShipmentByArea(Hashtable<String,Object> data)
      Retrieves all shipment orders with a specific area and with "Waiting for confirmation" status from the DB.
      Parameters:
      data - A hashtable that contains the "userArea" key, the value is a string that represents the wanted area.
      Returns:
      ServerMessage An object that encapsulates the result of the method. It contains "shipmentByArea" key, the value is an ArrayList of Shipment object that match the area and status.

    • getReceviedShipmentForConfirmation

      public static ServerMessage getReceviedShipmentForConfirmation(Hashtable<String,Object> data)
      Retrieves all shipment orders with a specific area and with "In Proccess" status and already received by the customer from the DB.
      Parameters:
      data - A hashtable that contains the "recivedOrderUserArea" key, the value is a string that represents the wanted area.
      Returns:
      ServerMessage An object that encapsulates the result of the method. It contains "receivedShipmentsForConfirmation" key, the value is an ArrayList of Shipment object that match the area and status.

    • updateShipmentStatus

      public static ServerMessage updateShipmentStatus(Hashtable<String,Object> data)

      Parameters:
      data - A hashtable that contains the "shipmentToUpdate" key, the value is a Shipment object that contains the updated status.
      Returns:
      ServerMessage An object with "Nothing to get" instruction to the client because its update the DB and don't get any result.

    • updateEstimateDate

      public static ServerMessage updateEstimateDate(Hashtable<String,Object> data)
      Update the estimate delivery time of an order in the database.
      Parameters:
      data - - A Hashtable containing the following key-value pairs: "orderNumForUpdateEstimateDate" - The order number of the order being updated. "estimateDateForShipment" - The new estimate delivery date.
      Returns:
      A ServerMessage An object with "Nothing to get" instruction to the client because its update the DB and don't get any result.

    • getCustomerArea

      public static ServerMessage getCustomerArea(Hashtable<String,Object> data)
      Retrieves the area of a specific customer from the DB.
      Parameters:
      data - A hashtable that contains the "customerAreaToShipment" key, the value is a String object that contains the customer username.
      Returns:
      ServerMessage An object that encapsulates the result of the method. It contains "customerArea" key, the value is a String object that contains the customer area.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a HashMap containing the products as keys and their quantities as values.

    • fixDateDifference

      private static Date fixDateDifference(Date date)
      Returns a Date object that is one day ahead of the given Date object. Because when you get a Date object from the DB is get one day early.
      Parameters:
      date - the Date object to be fixed.
      Returns:
      the corresponding Date object that is one day ahead of the input, or null if the input is null.
